languages.text: "Ничего, как отыщу своих братьев, выследим со стаей этих усохших нелюдей и передавим, как яйца снежного змия! Никто не уйдет!"
"No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"
languages.original_text: "Ничего, как отыщу своих братьев, выследим со стаей этих усохших нелюдей и передавим, как яйца снежного змия! Никто не уйдет!"

traits.locale_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"

traits.locale_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “不管怎样，等我找到了我的兄弟们之后，我就和狼群一起追捕那群干瘪的异形，把他们像雪蛇蛋一样碾碎！一个都别想跑！”
languages.original_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"

traits.locale_text: “不管怎样，等我找到了我的兄弟们之后，我就和狼群一起追捕那群干瘪的异形，把他们像雪蛇蛋一样碾碎！一个都别想跑！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Peu importe. Quand j'aurai retrouvé mes frères, nous traquerons ces maudits non-humains en meute et nous les écraserons comme des œufs de serpent des neiges ! Aucun n'échappera à notre jugement ! »
languages.original_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"

traits.locale_text: « Peu importe. Quand j'aurai retrouvé mes frères, nous traquerons ces maudits inhumains en meute et nous les écraserons comme des œufs de serpent des neiges ! Aucun n'échappera à notre jugement ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No importa. Cuando encuentre a mis hermanos, mi jauría y yo daremos caza a estos enclenques inhumanos y los aplastaremos como huevos de serpiente de las nieves. ¡No escaparán!».
languages.original_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"

traits.locale_text: «No importa. Cuando encuentre a mis hermanos, mi jauría y yo daremos caza a estos enclenques inhumanos y los aplastaremos como huevos de serpiente de las nieves. ¡No escaparán!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「構わない。兄弟を見つけたら、群れと俺でこの干からびた人外どもを追い詰め、雪の蛇の卵のように粉砕する！誰も俺たちの手から逃れることはできない！」
languages.original_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"

traits.locale_text: 「構わない。兄弟を見つけたら、群れと俺でこの干からびた人外どもを追い詰め、雪の蛇の卵のように粉砕する！誰も俺たちの手から逃れることはできない！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Gleichgültig. Wenn ich meine Brüder gefunden habe, werden mein Rudel und ich diese verkümmerten Unmenschen jagen und zerquetschen wie die Eier von Schneeschlangen! Niemand wird unseren Klauen entkommen!"
languages.original_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"

traits.locale_text: "Gleichgültig. Wenn ich meine Brüder gefunden habe, werden mein Rudel und ich diese verkümmerten Unmenschen jagen und zerquetschen wie die Eier von Schneeschlangen! Niemand wird unseren Klauen entkommen!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"

languages.text: "Önemi yok. Kardeşlerimi bulduktan sonra sürümle birlikte bu solmuş insan dışıları avlayıp hepsini kar yılanı yumurtası gibi ezeceğim! Kimse pençemizden kurtulamayacak!"
languages.original_text: "No matter. Once I find my brothers, my pack and I will hunt down these withered inhumans and crush them like snow serpent eggs! None shall escape our grasp!"

traits.locale_text: "Önemi yok. Kardeşlerimi bulduktan sonra sürümle birlikte bu solmuş insan dışıları avlayıp hepsini kar yılanı yumurtası gibi ezeceğim! Pençemizden kimse kurtulamayacak!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
